channel.title: 474 Client
channel.description:
When running it on windows 7 i get this error:
[code]Error: Could not find or load main class client Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Ive checked the class file is named correctly and have all my variables set, i even moved the signlink out of the signlink folder into the java and class files folder, that solved my compiling errors but i still have this error when running client.
Any ideas?
